properties.name: checkbox
properties.desc: Returns the checkbox element used in header elements.

properties.name: disabled
properties.desc: Whether or not the checkbox of the header element is activated. If the value is `true`, the select all function is disabled.

properties.name: generateHeader
properties.desc: Creates and returns a header element for the field.

properties.name: generateTemplate
properties.desc: Creates a `template` for the field and returns an element with CSS style and binding syntax applied.

properties.name: headerEventDisabled
properties.desc: Disable header functions (sorting, position movement, size change).

properties.name: minWidth
properties.desc: This is the minimum width of the field. When the `resizable` feature is enabled, the size cannot be changed to be smaller than minWidth.

properties.name: styleName
properties.desc: This is the CSS style name of the field.

properties.name: width
properties.desc: This is the width of the field.

properties.name: _destroy
_disabledChanged
properties.desc: When the disabled property value changes, the activation state of the checkbox of the header element changes.

properties.name: _onCheckboxClick
properties.desc: Propagate the `check` event to the checkbox click event handler of the header element.
